content: प्रतिग्रहः {@--1@} Receiving, accepting. {@--2@} Receiving or accepting a donation. {@--3@} The right of receiving or accepting a donation. {@--4@} The right of receiving gifts (which is a peculiar prerogative of Brāhmaṇas); <ls>Ms. 1. 88</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 86</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 118.</ls> {@--5@} A gift, present, donation; राज्ञः प्रतिग्रहोऽयं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 14. 35.</ls> {@--6@} A receiver (of a gift). {@--7@} Kind or friendly reception. {@--8@} Favour, grace. {@--9@} Marrying. {@--10@} Listening to. {@--11@} The rear of an army. {@--12@} A spitting-pot. {@--13@} The sun near the moon's node.
